reviews.Title: Just wow!
reviews.Comment:
After just 2 days of use my review

1Camera Just out of the world
2 Performance At it best
3 Looks Unique with Aura lights
4 Display Crisp and Clear
5 Various Animations excellent work very premium feel.

Cons
1 Battery should have been a bit better at 43000 it's only 4600 at least 5000 considering the features and animation given in phones

2 Speaker Only Mono though the voice is loud and clear but 2 speakers have been better considering the cost.

reviews.Title: Delightful
reviews.Comment: V29pro is overall Good, Except it's Battery Backup. In this price tag 43K the battery should be 5000mah. For normal usage it's ok, but for gamers it's disppointing. No NFC feature. Camera performance is good. It's Display is good. Compared to Oppo some features are not available in the same price tag. Ok go for it if you are not a gamer, and medium user.
